overview:
Flint Seaton is one of the founders of Accellos. While Flintâ€™s primary focus is on the numbers, he is well versed in the overall operation of a software business and lends an invaluable perspective to the strategic direction of the company.

Prior to Accellos, Flint was the CFO of Xaware, a worldwide provider of information integration, conversion, and exchange solutions based upon eXtensible Markup Language (XML) and Service Oriented Architecture (SOA). Flint previously was the CFO of NxTrend Technology.
